mapper.select: select * from os_group os where os.GROUP_ID_ in (${groupId}) and TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId}

select.if: select * from os_group where DIM_ID_=#{dimId} and TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId} and PARENT_ID_ in (select parent_id_ from os_group where group_id_ in (SELECT oi.party1_ FROM os_inst_users ou RIGHT JOIN OS_REL_INST oi on ou.USER_ID_=oi.PARTY2_ WHERE oi.REL_TYPE_ID_='1' and oi.PARTY2_=#{userId} and ou.STATUS_='IN_JOB')) order by PATH_ asc
select * from os_group where DIM_ID_=#{dimId} and PARENT_ID_ = #{parentId} and TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId} order by PATH_ asc

mapper.select:
select * from os_group where group_id_ in ( select a.GROUP_ID_ from os_group a inner join os_grade_admin b on a.GROUP_ID_ = b.GROUP_ID_
where b.GROUP_ID_ in (select GROUP_ID_ from os_grade_admin where USER_ID_ = #{userId})
GROUP BY a.GROUP_ID_ )
mapper.sql: GROUP_ID_,DIM_ID_,NAME_,KEY_,STATU_,AREA_CODE_, RANK_LEVEL_,STATUS_,DESCP_,SN_,PARENT_ID_,DEPTH_,PATH_,FORM_,SYNC_WX_,WX_PARENT_PID_,WX_PID_, IS_DEFAULT_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_, (select count(*) from os_group where PARENT_ID_=grp.GROUP_ID_) CHILDS_
mapper.update: UPDATE os_group SET DIM_ID_=#{dimId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME_=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEY_=#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA_CODE_=#{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RANK_LEVEL_=#{rankLevel,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, STATUS_=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCP_=#{descp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SN_=#{sn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PARENT_ID_=#{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPTH_=#{depth,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PATH_=#{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDS_=#{childs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FORM_=#{form,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYNC_WX_=#{syncWx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WX_PARENT_PID_=#{wxParentPid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WX_PID_=#{wxPid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, IS_DEFAULT_=#{isDefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY_=#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME_=#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY_=#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME_=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE GROUP_ID_=#{groupId}
mapper.select:
SELECT ou.*,oi.IS_MAIN_ IS_MAIN_ FROM OS_GROUP,oi.ALIAS_ ALIAS_ ou RIGHT JOIN OS_REL_INST oi on ou.GROUP_ID_=oi.PARTY2_ WHERE oi.REL_TYPE_ID_=#{relTypeId} and oi.PARTY1_=#{groupId}
ORDER BY ${orderByClause}
select * from OS_GROUP p where p.parent_id_=#{parentId} and name_=#{name}

SELECT distinct ou.*,oi.IS_MAIN_ IS_MAIN_ FROM OS_GROUP ou INNER JOIN OS_REL_INST oi on ou.GROUP_ID_=oi.PARTY1_ WHERE oi.REL_TYPE_ID_=#{relTypeId} and oi.PARTY2_=#{userId} and oi.TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId}
SELECT ou.*,oi.IS_MAIN_ IS_MAIN_ FROM OS_GROUP ou JOIN OS_REL_INST oi on ou.GROUP_ID_=oi.PARTY1_ WHERE oi.DIM1_=#{dimId} and oi.REL_TYPE_ID_=#{relTypeId} and oi.PARTY2_=#{userId}
SELECT ou.* FROM OS_GROUP ou inner JOIN OS_REL_INST oi on ou.GROUP_ID_=oi.PARTY1_ WHERE oi.PARTY2_=#{party2} and oi.REL_TYPE_=#{relType} and oi.TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId}
SELECT distinct ou.*,oi.IS_MAIN_ IS_MAIN_ FROM OS_GROUP ou RIGHT JOIN OS_REL_INST oi on ou.GROUP_ID_=oi.PARTY1_ WHERE oi.PARTY2_=#{userId}
SELECT t.* FROM os_group t , OS_REL_INST rel where t.GROUP_ID_=rel.PARTY1_ and rel.DIM1_=1 and rel.PARTY2_=#{userId} and REL_TYPE_KEY_='GROUP-USER-BELONG' and rel.IS_MAIN_='YES'
SELECT t.* FROM os_group t where KEY_ =#{key} and TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId}
SELECT t.GROUP_ID_,t.PARENT_ID_,t.SN_,t.NAME_,t.SYNC_WX_,t.WX_PID_,t.WX_PARENT_PID_ from os_group t where t.DIM_ID_=1 and TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId}
mapper.update: update OS_GROUP set SYNC_WX_=1 where GROUP_ID_=#{groupId}
mapper.select: select max(WX_PID_) from os_group;
SELECT og.* FROM os_group_menu gm,os_group og where gm.GROUP_ID_=og.GROUP_ID_ and MENU_ID_=#{menuId} and og.STATUS_='ENABLED'
select os.* from os_group os where os.DIM_ID_ = #{dimId} and os.RANK_LEVEL_ = #{rankLevel}
select * from os_group where DIM_ID_=#{dimId} order by PATH_ asc
select * from os_group where DIM_ID_=#{dimId} and TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId} order by PATH_ asc
select * from os_group where DIM_ID_=#{dimId} and PARENT_ID_ = #{parentId} and TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId} and STATUS_='ENABLED' order by PATH_ asc
select count(*) from os_group where PARENT_ID_=#{parentId}
select * from os_group where DIM_ID_=#{dimId} and PARENT_ID_=#{parentId} order by PATH_ asc
select * from os_group where DIM_ID_=#{dimId} and NAME_=#{depName}
select * from os_group where DIM_ID_!=#{dimId} and NAME_=#{groupName}

select * from os_group where TENANT_ID_ in (#{tenantId},#{publicTenantId})
and DIM_ID_=#{dimId}
and NAME_ like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and KEY_ like CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%')
select * from os_group where KEY_=#{key}
select count(*) from os_group where PARENT_ID_ = #{parentId}
select count(*) from os_group where KEY_=#{key}
select * from os_group from where PARENT_ID_ = #{parentId}
select * from os_group where PATH_=#{path}
select * from os_group g LEFT JOIN os_rel_inst r on g.GROUP_ID_ = r.PARTY1_ where r.PARTY2_ = #{currentUserId} and PARENT_ID_ = #{parentId} and g.TENANT_ID_ = #{tenantId}
select * from os_group where PATH_ like #{path} and TENANT_ID_ =#{tenantId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO os_group (GROUP_ID_,DIM_ID_,NAME_,KEY_,AREA_CODE_,RANK_LEVEL_,STATUS_,DESCP_,SN_,PARENT_ID_,DEPTH_,PATH_,CHILDS_,FORM_,SYNC_WX_,WX_PARENT_PID_,WX_PID_,IS_DEFAULT_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,LAST_UPDATE_TIME_) VALUES (#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dimId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{rankLevel,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{descp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sn,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depth,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{childs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{form,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syncWx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{wxParentPid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{wxPid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE DIM_ID_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dimId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , DIM_ID_), NAME_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , NAME_), KEY_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEY_), AREA_CODE_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA_CODE_), RANK_LEVEL_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rankLevel,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, RANK_LEVEL_), STATUS_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_), DESCP_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{descp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCP_), SN_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SN_), PARENT_ID_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID_), DEPTH_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{depth,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, DEPTH_), PATH_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATH_), CHILDS_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{childs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CHILDS_), FORM_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{form,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORM_), SYNC_WX_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{syncWx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SYNC_WX_), WX_PARENT_PID_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{wxParentPid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WX_PARENT_PID_), WX_PID_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{wxPid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WX_PID_), IS_DEFAULT_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DEFAULT_), TENANT_ID_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANT_ID_), CREATE_BY_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY_), CREATE_TIME_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME_), UPDATE_BY_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_BY_), UPDATE_TIME_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME_), LAST_UPDATE_TIME_=IF(LAST_UPDATE_TIME_ < #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAST_UPDATE_TIME_)
mapper.select:
select * from os_group where group_id_ in
#{item}
select count(*) from os_group og where og.dim_id_=#{dimId} and og.key_=#{key} and og.tenant_id_=#{tenantId}
